concept.title: Delimited File Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the following delimited file properties for the Directory origin:

row.entry:
File type. Use one of the following options:
Basic CSV - file that includes comma-separated values
MS Excel CSV - Microsoft Excel comma-separated file
MySQL CSV - MySQL comma separated file
RFC4180 CSV - comma-separated file that strictly follows RFC4180 guidelines
Tab-Separated Values - file that includes tab-separated values
Do I need to say more?
Indicates whether a file contains a header line.
Converts a file to a map based on the fields in the header. If no header exists, uses column numbers to map the fields.
